marklogic.body: There were a total of 13 saturn 5's launched, from Apollo 4 to Skylab space station. How does he know from which Saturn the engines are from? It's pretty neat that the engines were found, but as a past employee of Amazon.com I wonder why his fullfillment centers are sweat shops where the employees work in severe Heat conditions, the Campbellsville KYÂ center often Reaches temperatures of 120 degrees in the summer with only fans to move the Heat around. Most employees are so desperate for work no one wants to rock the boat and call OSHA. I call shenanigans
